meanings.definition: A protein enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of proteins.
meanings.sent1: The subtilisin in our bodies helps to break down the food we eat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how subtilisin works to understand its role in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The subtilisin enzyme decided to throw a protein party and invited all its friends.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to analyze situations with the precision of subtilisin made her an excellent problem solver.
meanings.sent5: The subtilisin enzyme is like a tiny protein ninja, silently breaking down larger molecules.

meanings.definition: A substance used in laundry detergents to break down protein stains.
meanings.sent1: The subtilisin in the detergent helped remove the tough protein stain from the shirt.
meanings.sent2: Mom used a detergent with subtilisin to tackle the grass stains on my jeans.
meanings.sent3: The subtilisin in the detergent whispered to the protein stain, 'Time to say goodbye.'
meanings.sent4: The subtilisin detergent worked like a superhero, fighting off the evil protein stains.
meanings.sent5: With subtilisin in the detergent, even the most stubborn protein stains surrender.
